original_title: Former Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella Questioned by CID in Drug Transaction Probe
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Criminal Investigation Department (CID) is currently questioning former Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella regarding a controversial drug transaction.
The interrogation began at 9 a.m. this morning and is currently going on.

Files related to the case, including those seized from the office of the Additional Secretary of the Health Ministry Saman Ratnayake, have been forwarded to the government Government Analyst's Department.
